title: Kompani bilong yumi
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Lionel Hudson
brief_description: Surveys the varied activities of Namasu, a commercial co-operative owned mostly by native New Guineans, marketing products such as coffee, tea, wool, copra, and handicrafts, and encouraging local industry and trade generally in New Guinea.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Lionel Hudson
